game.name: Angela And Tom Beach Vacation
game.description:
Are you a lover of animal? Do you love to practice your fashion abilities whenever you get a chance? Join Angela and Tom Beach Vacation and be prepared to make all the arrangements your favorite characters need to spend their vacation at the seaside! They both rely on your fashion sense, so do your best to create the perfect beach outfits for them and make them feel proud on you.  Do not delay anymore as their vacation is going to take place tomorrow. 
Your first job in this brand new dressing game is to choose the swimwears and then help them to enjoy a wonderful vacation at the beach. Go through all the items that you see at the both sides of the screen and help the lovely couple to enjoy this special event! First dress up Tom with the nice swimsuit and also combine his beach look with other accessories! Once you work on Tom, get ready to help Angela to get ready for the beach vacation in this one of the best girls games. 
Both characters love each other so do not forget to adorn them with a love symbol. Be careful while choosing the products to make their fun beach vacation memorable! You will find a wide range of beautiful and modern clothes that they can wear during their whole vacation. All you need to do is just use your creative mind to create the perfect results. Browse through other top dressing games that you can play online for free on atmegame.com, no download required!
